title: Perfect body
description: Perfect body is a multipage website on which you can manage your everyday diet. I was working as a team lead during making this project with four of my teammates. Pet project.

title: Filmoteka
description: Filmoteka is the website made on VanillaJS on which you can search and collect your favorite movies. Pet project.

title: Icecream with passion
description: This was the first of my student projects. I worked as the team lead with two more teammates, and we tried to make it look tasty. Pet project.

title: Movie finder
description: Movie finder is a multipage website for searching movies which is made on ReactJs with React Router Dom. For each movie, you can get additional details, such as cast and reviews. Pet project.

title: Phonebook
description: The Phonebook is the feature for adding contacts that are showing in the list and can be filtered or deleted. Made with ReactJS, Redux and React Animations. Pet project.

title: Image finder
description: Image finder can help you to get all the pictures that you're interested in, just write a word to the input field. Pet project.

title: Mobile app
description: The Mobile app is a regular one-page website, made with beautiful transitions and holds some video inside. Pet project.

title: County finder
description: Country finder is the feature that can help you get detailed information about a country that you want to know more about. Pet project.

title: Collection with themes
description: This collection has two options for a visual theme, dark and light. Which one do you prefer? Pet project.

title: Picture slider
description: Picture slider shows you a collection of pictures. Choose any of them and switch with the keyboard arrows. Pet project.

title: Countdown timer
description: With the countdown timer, you can see how fast the time is passing and the next year is getting closer. Pet project.

title: Mogo
description: Mogo is the one-page website which has some cute transitions. Pet project.
